name: agentic-plugins
description: Agentic workflow automation plugins for AI-assisted development

plugins.name: agentic

plugins.description: Specification workflow management - create, plan, implement, review, test specs

plugins.description: Git workflow automation - pull requests, squash, rebase, releases

plugins.name: agentic-tools
plugins.description: Productivity utilities - browser, gsuite, video query, ADR, milestones
